full_summary:
**Explainable Artificial Intelligence for Command and Control Decision Support**
=====================================

### RFP Details
| Attributes | Values |
| --- | --- |
| Reference | WS4207433108-Doc4209647936 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4207433108 |
| Publication Date | October 5, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | November 17, 2023, 2:00 PM (Local Time) |
| Amendment Date | October 19, 2023 |

### Request for Proposal Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) is inviting proposals for the development of explainable artificial intelligence (AI) for command and control decision support systems in the context of continental defence C2.

The procurement is governed by Supply Arrangement W7701-176500, and the selection process aims to identify the most suitable vendor who can provide innovative solutions to improve the explainability and interpretability of AI-powered recommendations and predictions.

### Key Requirements
* Develop concepts and designs to enhance AI-driven decision support systems
* Explore and experiment with explainability and interpretability techniques
* Provide recommendations for continental defence C2 decision support systems

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The evaluation process will assess the vendor's ability to meet the requirements outlined above.

### Contact Information
Daniel Boisclair (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: Not provided
Email: <daniel.boisclair@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Tender Document
The tender document is available online at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17437937?extsite=MTc0Mzc5MzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. Responses to this solicitation must be submitted electronically through the Canada Post ePOST system. Note that the original tender closing date has expired. However, vendors may still express interest in participating in this request. Please contact the contracting authority for further information.

Please ensure all information is clear, concise and in a professional format ready to send out as is.  These government government tender details are useless if written in a way where errors can be introduced. Thus, know I trust your judgement. Thank you! 

Please take into account
